text: Bernie Fyffe (22 December 1921 – 9 March 1994) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Fitzroy Football Club and St Kilda Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1921 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:St Kilda Football Club players Category:Brunswick Football Club players
title: Bernie Fyffe
